mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team_member (team_id, user_id, role) VALUES (#{teamId}, #{userId}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT a.team_id, a.user_id, a.role, b.email, b.nickname, b.position, b.profile_img FROM team_member a, user b WHERE a.team_id = #{teamId} AND a.user_id = b.id AND a.deleted_at IS NULL
